about_the_game:
There's an island, surrounded by clouds with a pleasing landscape. But also it's a hub for fantastic exciting adventures.

【Loads of Games - Continually Updated】

Play all sorts of VR games with your pals - competitive, adventurous, team-based, chill - there's something for everyone. And we're adding more all the time!
  • Genting Zuma
Blast those colored orbs with your space gun, rookie astronaut. As you level up, things get tougher!
  • Zombie Cave
Enter the deadly cave with your team, and fight off the cheeky zombies that interrupt your adventure.
  • Homeland Defenser
As the village's last line of defense, protect your home from invaders with powerful weapons.
  • High Noon
A Western shootout - new sheriffs on the scene, gunslingers going rogue. Time for a duel in the Wild West!
  • Heroes Unleashed
Intense battles in dangerous settings. Defeat the boss in the allotted time, power up by eliminating smaller enemies, and repelling other players.
  • Bonfire Campsite
Experience the warmth and romance of a camping trip under the starry sky. Perfect for a game of Werewolf!
  • Virus Clash
Shoot those viruses with your trusty bow, send them fleeing. A fun mix of offense and defense on a colorful battlefield, full of action and fun!

【Engage in delightful social interactions, nurture pets, and build your dream home】

Have a blast socializing and creating your world in Genting Party!
  • Socializing in the Lobby
The cloud island is the perfect place to make friends, chat, and have fun. A simple high five is all it takes to add someone as a friend. Don't forget to take a group photo with the in-game camera!
  • Lobby Mini-Games
Play lots of fun games in the hall - basketball, whack-a-mole, cosmic slingshot, hoop toss, darts, dragon dance, and many more. Twice the fun with friends!
  • Pets
Experience the joy of raising pets in the cloud. Pets in Cloud Party can be taken anywhere, cared for, and nurtured into your own unique pet!
  • Home
We provide a customizable private space where you can place a wide variety of furniture and decorations, cultivate crops, and create a home that truly represents your style and tastes!
-Outfits
Express yourself with our colorful outfits. From cool to cute to quirky, make a stunning statement in Genting Party!

name: Genting Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support:

short_description: Genting Party is a VR social hub， loaded with a variety of free VR games, continually updated and ever-expanding!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
